languages.text: "Как будет угодно Вольному Торговцу". {n}На лице Соломона написано равнодушие, но в глубине взгляда читается облегчение.{/n}
"As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как будет угодно Вольному Торговцу". {n}На лице Соломона написано равнодушие, но в глубине взгляда читается облегчение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

"As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーのご意志のままに」{n}ソロモーンの表情は無感情だが、そのまなざしの奥に安堵の色が見て取れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーのご意志のままに」{n}ソロモーンの表情は無感情だが、そのまなざしの奥に安堵の色が見て取れた。{/n}

languages.text: "Wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} wünscht." {n}Solomornes Miene ist gleichgültig, aber in den Tiefen seines Blicks entdeckst du Erleichterung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} wünscht." {n}Solomornes Miene ist gleichgültig, aber in den Tiefen seines Blicks entdeckst du Erleichterung.{/n}

languages.text: « Les désirs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sont des ordres. » {n}L'expression de Solomorne est indifférente, mais vous percevez un certain soulagement dans les tréfonds de son regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les désirs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sont des ordres. » {n}L'expression de Solomorne est indifférente, mais vous percevez un certain soulagement dans les tréfonds de son regard.{/n}

languages.text: «Como desee mi Comerciante Independiente». {n}La expresión de Solomorne es de indiferencia, pero notas cierto alivio en lo más profundo de su mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como desee mi Comerciante Independiente». {n}La expresión de Solomorne es de indiferencia, pero notas cierto alivio en lo más profundo de su mirada.{/n}

languages.text: “如你所愿，行商浪人。”{n}索罗蒙保持着冷漠的表情，但你从他目光深处看到了如释重负的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如你所愿，行商浪人。”{n}索罗蒙保持着冷漠的表情，但你从他目光深处看到了如释重负的意味。{/n}

languages.text: "Hür Tacir nasıl dilerse." {n}Solomorne'un suratı en ufak bir ifadeden yoksun olsa da bakışlarından rahatladığını çıkarıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As the Rogue Trader wishes." {n}Solomorne's expression is indifferent, but you detect relief in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir nasıl dilerse." {n}Solomorne'un yüzün ifadesiz olsa da bakışının derinliklerinde bir rahatlama görürsün.{/n}
